headline.main: Kellogg Drops Phelps and a Drug Bust Ends a Sumo's Career

docs.abstract: A Japanese sumo wrestler caught with marijuana is kicked out of the sport in disgrace and offers an apology and a promise to not ask for the retirement pay he earned.
docs.lead_paragraph: Update | 8:35 p.m. Reuters reports tonight that Michael Phelps has lost his first endorsement:
docs.snippet: A Japanese sumo wrestler caught with marijuana is kicked out of the sport in disgrace and offers an apology and a promise to not ask for the retirement pay he earned.

headline.print_headline: Study Likens Societal Cost Of Meth Use To Heroin’s
headline.main: Societal Cost of Meth Use Is Gauged in New Study

docs.lead_paragraph: A new study said that methamphetamine abuse imposed costs of $23.4 billion in 2005, suggesting that the drug takes an economic toll nearly as great as heroin.
docs.snippet: A new study said that methamphetamine abuse imposed costs of $23.4 billion in 2005, suggesting that the drug takes an economic toll nearly as great as heroin.
